content: Can you refer to an automatically-generated hidden assumption (like h✝) explicitly in a tactic somehow (e.g., so that it does what you'd naively expect rw [h✝] to do)? If not, is there some standard way to make them explicit once they already exist in the context?
(In particular, I'm looking to refer to some of the assumptions split introduced.)
rename_i renames the last automatically introduced hygenic names.
In a tactic, you should use FVarId to refer to hypotheses instead of user names where possible
